Issue.creator: shimos
Issue.summary: Some error log in chaincode handler is not formatted properly
Issue.description: DEBU 5805f Received QUERY_STATE_CLOSE, invoking query state close from ledger 2017-08-24 22:36:48.521 UTC chaincode afterQueryStateClose -> DEBU 58060 Exiting QUERY_STATE_CLOSE 2017-08-24 22:36:48.521 UTC chaincode filterError -> DEBU 58061 Ignoring NoTransitionError: no transition 2017-08-24 22:36:48.521 UTC chaincode 2 -> ERRO 58062 fe8f960c ERROR Failed to get transaction context. Sending %!s(MISSING) 2017-08-24 22:36:48.521 UTC chaincode 1 -> DEBU 58063 fe8f960c handleQueryStateClose serial send ERROR {noformat} "%!s(MISSING)" definitely comes from wrong formatting in golang. >
